Row.Text: +25 XP for all Units. This XP counts toward your next [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great General when awarded to a newly produced Military Land Unit.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]City must have an Armory.
Our people are now abstaining from alcohol and sex, and living the lives of hardened soldiers. We're worried the rest of the world will also succumb to the influence of your culture.
Encourage Military Sciences

War is, of course, the greatest lubricant to progress, and so, in this age where war is fought not only by soldiers but also by scientists and engineers, let us see that the military sciences are amply supported by the gold in our treasury.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must Sweden (Karl XII) [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have researched Military Science [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+2 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science from every Barracks, Armory, and Military Academy

War is, of course, the greatest lubricant to progress, and so, in this age where war is fought not only by soldiers but also by scientists and engineers, let us see that the military sciences are amply supported by the gold in our treasury.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+2 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science from every Barracks, Armory, and Military Academy
Establish the Octal Numerical System

There are serious flaws in the application of our current numerical system when it comes to matters of war. Not accurately enough does it calculate the supplies that we both use and need. That is why we shall henceforth employ the octal system.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must Sweden (Karl XII) [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have researched Military Science [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Num} [ICON_RESEARCH] Science [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]5 Units are maintenance free [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May support 25% more units

There are serious flaws in the application of our current numerical system when it comes to matters of war. Not accurately enough does it calculate the supplies that we both use and need. That is why we shall henceforth employ the octal system.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]5 Units are maintenance free [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May support 25% more units
{1_LeaderName} of {2_CivName} has developed the octal numerical system in order to more accurately calculate war supplies.
The Anjala Conspiracy

It has been revealed to us that a group of disgruntled officers are conspiring against our current war efforts. Secretly, they have been in contact with our enemies, leaking crucial information and undermining our favourable position in this war.[NEWLINE]
Perhaps we can negotiate with the traitors.
Execute the traitors!
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age Points[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]60% chance you gain two free Great Generals[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {1_Num} [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age Points[ENDCOLOR]
We have settled the disgruntlement of our officers and won back their allegiance.
{1_LeaderName} of {2_CivName} has shrewdly negotiated talks with several military officers found to be conspiring against him.
Unfortunately, negotiations with our disgruntled officers have failed and we were forced to have them imprisoned.
{1_LeaderName} of {2_CivName} has imprisoned several military officers found to be conspiring against him.
We have executed those officers opposed to our current war efforts.
{1_LeaderName} of {2_CivName} has put down several military officers found to be conspiring against him.
Call for Reprieve

Our rule over Sweden is a tireless one, and without reprieve we should expect an early grave. Accordingly, we have been offered some advice: our chaplain has suggested that we take prayer, our chancellor that we take to the bed of a sultry {1_Gender}, and our good friend that we take to drink.[NEWLINE]
No rest for the weary.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age Points[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]All Military Land Units gain 5 XP[ENDCOLOR]
We shall never take rest so long as enemies stand at our borders!
Perhaps we shall find our answers in God.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]All Military Land Units lose 5 XP[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {1_Num} {2_YieldType}[ENDCOLOR]
We have decided to surrender our charge on the battlefield in order to spend time in prayer.
Perhaps sex would do us well.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]All Military Land Units lose 5 XP[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {1_Num} [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age Points[ENDCOLOR]
We have decided to surrender our charge on the battlefield in order to lay with another.
Perhaps a drink or two would do no harm.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]All Military Land Units lose 5 XP[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]All cities begin celebrating 'We Love the King Day' for 5 turns[ENDCOLOR]
We have decided to surrender our charge on the battlefield in order to lay with another (yes, this is intentionally the same as the sex one).
Ulrika Eleonora
